pr_title: Add step for saving examples table to variable as list of maps

timeline.author: valfirst
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -229,6 +231,21 @@ public void saveVariableToFile(String pathname, String fileContent) throws IOExc
         FileUtils.writeStringToFile(new File(pathname), fileContent, StandardCharsets.UTF_8);
     }
 
+    /**
+     * Saves examples table as list of maps to variable
+     * @param scope NEXT_BATCHES, STORY, SCENARIO, STEP
+     * @param variableName A name of variable to assign the values
+     * @param examplesTable A table for saving in variable
+     */
+    @When("I initialize the $scope variable `$variableName` with values:$examplesTable")
+    public void saveExamplesTableToVariableAsListOfMaps(VariableScope scope, String variableName,
+            ExamplesTable examplesTable)
